8/28
You may wish to use LaTeX to typeset solutions. If you are new to using LaTeX, I can help. Your first step is to install LaTeX; here are some installation guides.

  • Latex Installation for Windows

  • Latex Installation for Mac

I didn’t write a guide for Linux; if you are using Linux and need help

8/28
Here is an Octave tutorial.
8/28
You will use your choice of Matlab or Octave in this class. You can buy Matlab for $49 for the student edition. I have written instructions for installing Octave, which is free, but more of a hassle to install.

  • Octave Installation for Windows

  • Octave Installation for Mac

I didn’t write a guide for Linux; if you are using Linux and need help just let me know.

8/28
We will use Piazza for course-related discussions outside of class time. You’ll need to sign up to start using the service.
